name: Ambrosia Devon Custard, 14.1-Ounce Can (Pack of 4)
short_description: Imported from Britain
Gluten Free
product_description: Since 1917, milk has been delivered fresh to our Devon dairy. That's why you can rely on Ambrosia to provide a delicious, wholesome treat without artificial colours or preservatives. Devon Custard tastes so creamy and smooth, with more than a glass and a half of skimmed milk in every 425 g can. Ambrosia Devon Custard is a low fat food with less than 3% fat and is suitable for vegetarians. Milk is a good source of calcium, which is important for healthy teeth and bones.

name: Jell-O French Vanilla Instant Pudding & Pie Filling Mix, 3.4 oz Box
short_description: One 3.4 oz box of Jell-O French Vanilla Artificially Flavored Instant Pudding & Pie Filling Mix
Jell-O French Vanilla Artificially Flavored Instant Pudding & Pie Filling Mix is a sweet treat on its own as well as a perfect ingredient for dessert recipes
Contains 90 calories per serving
Simply mix with 2 cups of cold milk and allow to set for 5 minutes; refrigerate any leftovers
Each pudding mix is individually packaged in a sealed pouch for freshness
Every package makes 4 1/2-cup servings
SNAP & EBT eligible food item
product_description: Snack happy. Jell-O French Vanilla Artificially Flavored Instant Pudding Mix & Pie Filling tastes delicious whether you enjoy it as a treat or use it as an ingredient in your favorite dessert recipes. Add some wonder to your day with a delicious artificially flavored French vanilla dessert. Fun to make with your kids, our artificially flavored French vanilla pudding mix can also be used to create a poke cake, tasty crepes or French vanilla pie filling. Our artificially flavored French vanilla pudding is ready in as little as five minutes. Simply stir milk into the pudding mix and allow to set. Every Jell-O pudding mix comes packaged in a 3.4-ounce sealed pouch. Pudding fun in every bite.

short_description: Make delicious, rich & creamy custard instantly with Weikfield Vanilla Custard Powder.
It is 100% vegan and is great for vegetarians too.
This rich French Vanilla flavoured custard is easy and quick to make, and is perfect for a last-minute dessert.
The custard is a versatile dessert that you can enjoy by itself or with other foods, such as crumbles, fruits, etc.
With the Weikfield Custard Powder Mix, you can indulge in delectable homemade custard recipes anytime!

short_description: Easy-to-make dessert
product_description: Get used to having mouth-watering desserts at home with Brown & Polson custard powder in a classic vanilla flavor. name: Bird's Original Instant Custard Powder 240g – Classic British Dessert Mix, Just Add Water, Creamy & Delicious (Pack of 1)
short_description: Includes: 1 pack of Bird's Original Instant Custard Powder 240g
Classic British Taste – Made with Alfred Bird’s original 1837 recipe, delivering the authentic, comforting flavor of traditional British custard.
Quick & Easy Preparation – Simply add milk and sugar to create smooth, homemade-style custard in minutes with reliable results every time.
No Artificial Colors or Preservatives – Crafted without artificial colors or preservatives, making it a clean, family-friendly dessert choice.
Convenient 240g Pack Size – Resealable packaging designed for freshness and multiple servings, ideal for everyday use or special occasions.
Smooth & Creamy Texture – Thickens to a rich, velvety consistency that perfectly enhances pies, crumbles, puddings, and other classic desserts.
product_description: BIRD'S is the original custard brand, established in 1837 and loved by generations ever since. Bird's Custard is made and served in millions of homes where proper custard is at the heart of a good pud!

name: Shan - Custard Powder Vanilla, 7 oz (200g) Suitable for Vegetarians, Halal (Pack of 3)
short_description: Shan Custard Powder - Vanilla is your saviour to make traditional dessert at home within minutes for a perfect dessert experience
Ingredients: Maize starch, Carrageenan gum, Salt, Artificial vanilla flavour, Tartrazine (FD&C Yellow No. 5), Allura Red AC (FD&C Red No.40).
Your savior to rich and creamy traditional dessert made with a perfect combination
Quality Control- All our products are carefully packaged under the most hygienic conditions according to international quality standard.
Packing: 200g Serving Suggestion
product_description: Description: Shan Foods was a small company established in 1981. Soon it gained popularity and now we have a presence in 65 countries across 5 continents. All our products are carefully packaged under the most hygienic conditions according to international quality standard. All products of Shan Foods are ISO 9001:2015. Shan Foods is committed to making your life easier in the kitchen and at the same time delighting your taste buds. We are the pioneer of ready to make masala packets. We are continuously working hard to ensure you can serve authentic Pakistani/Indian food to your loved ones. Each recipe is tailored to ensure a delicious taste through our special herbs seasoning and spices. Shan’s Traditional Desserts range offers convenience by allowing our consumers to make delicious desserts in the comfort of their homes. Available in distinct variants, Shan’s Traditional Desserts offer something for every occasion. Shan Vanilla Custard provides with rich, creamy and delicious Custard that the whole family can enjoy.
